title: What is the normal work hours for a fresher at Cognizant Technology Solutions? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be precise, Not only Cognizant Technology Solutions, in every corporate, working hours entirely depend on you and your manager… See how… Corporates are concerned with output (target within deadline) and not time for output (unless you are taking excessive time)… So, faster you complete your work, faster you can go… Even, some corporates allow you to do work from home… If your reporting manager actually has good managerial capabilities and provided, you are giving output on time, he/she will never mess up with you for short working hours. Rather, he/she will stand by you for all odds…  So, don’t worry… No need to go through the conventional 9 hours (9 am to 6 pm), but put in your efforts to complete the work as soon as possible… Trust me, Corporate Life is Coool… So, Enjoy it to the fullest!!!

It would depend on the shift that you are assigned to. If you belog to the normal shift, it would start by 9 in the morning and end by 6 in the evening. But again! it could be possible, that you haven't been assigned any task. If this is the case, then you needn't worry. The maximum that you'd have to stay in office would be till 6 in the evening. :D
